Name: Musical Reflex
About the game: Musical Reflex is a game as its name suggests where you can test your musical reflex by having fun or trying to improve yourself and try to be the best in the ladder. The principle of the game is pretty simple, press the right keys at the right time all this enbiencer with a music chooses. If you found some bug or you have tips for improving the game you are welcome to share them. Key features : - 3 songs - 4 game modes : classic, speed, ranked (with a ladder) and kill them all (fun game mode). - 7 backgrounds and 7 differents colors for the balls that you can change by buying them in the shop for money win in-game.
